page.title: 05The Canal Basin
page.content: The Canal Basin is full of water which comes from feeder pools at Foxton and Saddington and a resevoir at Saddington.The Basin is small.It has 16 workers_carpenters,metal workers,electricians and office workers.7 boats are always in the Basin.4 boats a year are made Each boat takes about 4 months.The boats are hired from all over England. However,people from{MARKET HARBOROUGH} don't hire boats from{MARKET {HARBOROUGH}Baisin because they think they know the canal.The materials used are steel and plastic. Canal boats aren't very popular any more.Only 9 boats are hired at any time of the year.
